permitHolder: UPPER MANHATTAN MENTAL HEALTH CENTER INC

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Monitoring Inspection Non-Routine - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was observed that child care service failed to provide appropriate guards on designated structures/equipment to protect children from potential injury
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service not free of pests or maintains pest harborage conditions at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to take any and all necessary action to eliminate potential hazards
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to conduct and document monthly fire drills
